articles.title: Neutrinos Prove Our Sun Is Undergoing a Second Type of Fusion in Its Core - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Like all stars, our Sun is powered by the fusion of hydrogen into heavier elements. Nuclear fusion is not only what makes stars shine, it is also a primary source of the chemical elements that make the world around us.

articles.title: Frost moon shines down on Europe ahead of a week that will appropriately see UK temperatures plunge - Daily Mail
articles.description: Known as 'the frost moon' this month's full moon has been pictured behind Hardy's Monument near Dorchester in Dorset this evening. The frost moon will look full for about two to three days.
articles.content:
